venue.address_2: ( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.description:
Bachata and salsa lessons 8:30-10pm. Dancing 10pm-1am.

The one time I went, the lessons started a bit late. I will be there at 8:45pm.

Check out some info for this event on Facebook:  www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=169725133077973

Wear green for St. Patrick's Day and get a discount at the door!  Also looks like there will be special drinks for the occasion ($3 green beer, $5 cocktails: Irish Sunset, Leprechaun's Delight).

Thanks for the info Keoki!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa and bachata dancing Wed. night at An Tua Nua
